name: Dartwing Frappe App Development
initializeCommand: docker network inspect frappe_frappe-network >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo 'Warning: frappe_frappe-network not found! Start the main Frappe devcontainer first.' && docker rm -f dartwing-frappe-dev 2>/dev/null || true
postStartCommand: cp /workspace/.devcontainer/setup-dartwing.sh /workspace/development/frappe-bench/setup-dartwing.sh && chmod +x /workspace/development/frappe-bench/setup-dartwing.sh && docker exec frappe-dev bash /workspace/development/frappe-bench/setup-dartwing.sh || echo 'Setup will run when frappe-dev is available'
postAttachCommand: echo 'Connected to Dartwing Frappe workspace. Frappe bench shared at /workspace/development/frappe-bench'
